Articles.Content:
Is there a mod or a config file I can edit to disable the warning when collecting data from one-time use experiments? At the very least, I think it would be great for the message not to pop up if a scientist is operating the experiment, I'm just starting to get tired of always having to click through that.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-02T03:18:31Z" title="06/02/2015 03:18  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 2, 2015</time> by LittleBlueGaming**

you can disable the one-timeness in the part cfg file, but if you want to keep the experiments one-time use only you'll need a mod to disable that pop-up dialog. Or you can disable the property in the cfg file (forget the name of the property in ModuleScienceExperiment, but it's obvious - just set it to false) and just enforce the one-time use yourself rather than rely on the game to force you to only use it once.

Thanks. I had to add "rerunnable = True" to the goo and materials studies. Unfortunately, it automatically resets the animation as well, but I guess that will do.

Maybe I should learn to mod ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
